title: Bifurcating spatial patterns arising from travelling waves in a tissue interaction model
abstract: We analyse a tissue interaction model recently proposed to account for pattern formation in the morphogenesis of skin organ primordia. We show that the model can exhibit travelling wave solutions which leave in their wake a spatially nonuniform, steady state solution
